about_the_game:
RE:Ark is an isometric hack'n'slash shooter set inside the AI-controlled megastructure Ark, 900 years after humanity's technological singularity. The main character is a human function whose goal is to collect cognitive units and subsequently transfer them to artificial intelligence. He will have to overcome the tests prepared by the Ark, find out the reason for the collapse of the megastructure and stop it.

WHAT AWAITS YOU


-Dynamic tactical combat
Move, dodge attacks and hit back to defeat the toughest opponents.

-Instruments of violence
Your arsenal and abilities allow you to be one step ahead of the enemy. Select and combine various weapons and post-human abilities of the hero to suit your fighting style. Choose your tactics.

-Post-Singularity World
Explore the spaces of the megastructure, come face to face with dangerous creatures and stop the collapse of the megastructure.

WARNING
A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns that may appear in video games.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains intense violence, bloody scenes and gore (including the beheading or dismemberment of zombie-like creatures).
